mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (article_no, board_no, user_no, article_head, article_title, article_content ) VALUES (article_seq.NEXTVAL, #{board_no}, #{user_no}, #{article_head}, #{article_title}, #{article_content} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.article_no "article_no", a.article_head "article_head", a.article_title "article_title", a.article_content "article_content", a.user_no "user_no", To_char(a.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "regdate", a.hitcount "hitcount", a.board_no "board_no", (SELECT user_nm FROM users WHERE user_no = a.user_no) "user_nm", (SELECT board_nm FROM board WHERE board_no = a.board_no) "board_nm" FROM article a WHERE article_no = #{article_no}

SELECT a.article_no "article_no", a.article_head "head", a.article_title "article_title", a.article_content "article_content", u.user_nm "user_nm", To_char(a.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "regdate", a.hitcount "hitcount", a.board_no "board_no", (SELECT board_nm FROM board WHERE board_no = a.board_no) "board_nm" FROM article a JOIN users u ON a.user_no=u.user_no WHERE a.board_no=#{board_no}

SELECT article_no, article_head, article_title, article_content, regdate, hitcount, board_no, board_nm, user_nm FROM (SELECT Ceil(rownum / 10) page, article_no, article_head, article_title, article_content, hitcount, regdate, board_no, board_nm, user_nm FROM (SELECT article_no, article_head, article_title, article_content, To_char(article.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate, hitcount, board_no, (SELECT board_nm FROM board WHERE board_no = article.board_no) board_nm, (SELECT user_nm FROM users WHERE user_no = article.user_no) user_nm FROM article ORDER BY article_no DESC) WHERE board_no= #{board_no} ) WHERE page = #{page}

SELECT article_no, article_head, article_title, article_content article_content, regdate regdate, hitcount hitcount, board_no board_no, board_nm board_nm, user_nm user_nm FROM (SELECT Ceil(rownum / #{perPageNum}) page, article_no, article_head, article_title, article_content, hitcount, regdate, board_no, board_nm, user_nm FROM (SELECT article_no, article_head, article_title, article_content, To_char(article.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate, hitcount, board_no, (SELECT board_nm FROM board WHERE board_no = article.board_no) board_nm, (SELECT user_nm FROM users WHERE user_no = article.user_no) user_nm FROM article ORDER BY article_no DESC) WHERE board_no= #{board_no} ) WHERE page = #{page}

SELECT article_no, article_head, article_title, article_content, regdate, hitcount, board_no, board_nm, user_nm FROM (SELECT Ceil(rownum / #{perPageNum}) page, article_no, article_head, article_title, article_content, hitcount, regdate, board_no, board_nm, user_nm FROM (SELECT article_no, article_head, article_title, article_content, To_char(article.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate, hitcount, board_no, (SELECT board_nm FROM board WHERE board_no = article.board_no) board_nm, (SELECT user_nm FROM users WHERE user_no = article.user_no) user_nm FROM article ORDER BY article_no DESC) WHERE board_no= #{board_no}) WHERE page = #{page}

if.if: and (article_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' Or article_content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' Or user_nm like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
